name: Linda DAVEY v. Melville G. DAVEY, Jr.

judges: BEVILACQUA, C. J., and DORIS, J., did not participate.
parties: Linda DAVEY v. Melville G. DAVEY, Jr.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petitioner’s motion for stay of the Family Court decree pending appeal is denied without prejudice to its being renewed following the filing of the transcript herein.
BEVILACQUA, C. J., and DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Toro Law Associates, Inc., Eugene F. Toro, Providence, for petitioner.
Allen M. Kirshenbaum, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Linda DAVEY v. Melville G. DAVEY, Jr.
No. 80-377-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Sept. 25, 1980.
Toro Law Associates, Inc., Eugene F. Toro, Providence, for petitioner.
Allen M. Kirshenbaum, Providence, for respondent.
